divs: sighting detailsshortly before sunset that evening i was picking up my son from his friends house when i noticed a orange sphere moving slowly acouple hundred feet over the trees.i slowed down to observe what i thought was a helicopter moving south.since there is a marine logistics base near us my first thought was it was military,but i quickly saw that it wasn't.it was absolutly silent and had no real shape to it or outline of an aircraft. i got out of my car and watched it slowly maneuver south\southeast,i got back in and continued on to pick up my son.on the way back[not even 5 minutes later] it was gone.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around February 28th 2010
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
